title: my league acc was hacked
body: my email got hacked and they changed my email my login name was xenonwolfy my last game played was with Kayne  email was xenon.wolfy@gmail.com and i would like my league acc back

replies.body: Hurry and reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by selecting "I need help recovering my account". They'll be able to verify you as the account creator, and once you've done that you'll be back on the Rift in no time ^_^!
